sections.heading: 01|Unclaimed funds definitions
sections.text: Effective:September 30, 2025Latest Legislation:House Bill 96 - 136th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:(A) "Financial organization" means any bank, trust company, savings bank, safe deposit comp

sections.heading: and other intangible property transferred to the director shall, within a reasonable time, be converted to cash and the proceeds deposited as provided for other funds
sections.text: and other intangible property transferred to the director shall, within a reasonable time, be converted to cash and the proceeds deposited as provided for other funds.
